text:
RELIGION

Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, BHEL Township: Brahmotsavam, ratharohanam, 7 a.m.; thiruther vadam pidithal, 8 a.m.; theerthavari, 4 p.m.

National Institute of Technology Prayer Cell: Easter extravaganza, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Vasudeva Perumal Sannidhi, Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.; Sri Krishnar Sannidhi, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 1, Cauvery Street, Ayyappa Nagar, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Bharathidasan University Department of Environmental Management: Lecture on “Real time monitoring of environmental impact through smart governance”, by L. Soma Sundaram, Director, Research, Akara Research and Technologies, Chennai, 2.30 p.m.

National Institute of Technology Instrumentation and Control Engineering Association: Sensors 2016 – national technical symposium, S.N.Banerjee, additional general manager, C&I Systems, Instrumentation Limited, Srinivasan Sundarrajan, Director, NIT, Tiruchi, presides, 5 p.m.

Federation of Obstetric and Gynaecological Societies of India: Felicitations to Youth team of Bharathidasan University women students and youth of Tiruchi on successful completion of rally from Tiruchi to Agra, Garbaratchagi Mahal, Cantonment, 4.30 p.m.

Bharathidasan University Department of Plant Science: Valediction of conference on Emerging trends in plant science, M.Krishnan, Syndicate Member, chief guest, 4.15 p.m.

J.J. College of Engineering and Technology Swayam Entrepreneurship Development Cell: Valediction of Anubhav 2016 – entrepreneurship week, P.K.Kumravel, founder and CEO, Naturals Salon and Spa, and Kathir Loganathan, chairman, Varnam Foundation, speak, 2 p.m.

Shrimati Indira Gandhi College: Demonstration on preparation of green fodder and bio fertilizer, Perugamani, P. Palayam, P.Pazhaiyur, Sirugamani Agraharam and Malaiyappa Nagar, 9.30 a.m.

National College Department of English: Prof. S. Thothadri Iyengar Endowment Lecture on “Chicago address” by Swamy Murugananda Sarasawati, Managing Trustee, Arunachala Unique Mountain Trust, noon.; Department of Commerce: K.K. Srinivasan, auditor, speaks on Budget 2016, noon;; History Association meeting, M. Arokiasamy Xavier, Head, Department of History, St. Joseph’s College, speaks on “Socio Religious movements in the 19{+t}{+h}century in Tamil Nadu,” 11.30 a.m.

The Booksellers and Publishers Association of South India: Book fair, Corporation grounds, Anna Nagar, Thennur, 11 a.m.

Sri Sivananda Balalaya: Teacher enrichment programme on “Cognitive learning for children,” C.K. Dhanapandian and P.R. Krishnamurthy, rehabilitation psychologists, Satchita Psychological Research and Training Centre, resource persons, Ramalinga Nagar campus, 10.30 a.m.

Bishop Heber College Department of Social Work: Awareness programme on “Mental health,” Sebastiar Street, Warehouse, 6 p.m.

CARE Group of Institutions: Hertz – national-level technical symposium, 10 a.m.

J.J. College of Engineering and Technology: Workshop on “VLSI system design with altera FPGA tools”, D. Ramesh, chief technical officer, Chip Crafts Technologies, resource person, 10 a.m.

Chidambaram Pillai College for Women, Manachanallur: Cancer awareness programme, Dr. V. Sujatha of Dr. Viswanathan Cancer Centre, 10.30 a.m.

M.A.M. College of Engineering: Scientia 2016, R.A. Krishna Kumar, Executive Director, Dalmia Cement, chief guest, 9 a.m.; workshop on “basic electronic component testing and analysis”, A.K. Kasthuri, resource person, 10 a.m.

Jayaram College of Engineering and Technology CSI Students Branch: Paper presentation, 10 a.m.
title: tiruchi today
